rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR"
make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/systemd/system" install -m 0644 "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/init.d/auditd.service" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/systemd/system"
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/audit/rules.d" install -m 0640 "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/rules/10-base-config.rules" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/audit/rules.d/audit.rules"
